verses.verse: Keep <S%H8104><s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> thou <S%H1980>goest<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and be more <S%H7126>ready<s%> to <S%H8085>hear,<s%> than to <S%H4480>give<s%> <S%H5414><s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H3684>fools:<s%> for they <S%H3045>consider<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

Be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H926>rash<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and let <S%H408>not<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H4116>hasty<s%> to <S%H3318>utter<s%> any <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> let thy <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4592>few.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> through the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H6045>business;<s%> and a <S%H3684>fool's<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> is known by <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H1697>words.<s%>

When <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H5087>vowest<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H309>defer<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> to <S%H7999>pay<s%> it; <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> in <S%H3684>fools:<s%> <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H5087>vowed.<s%>

Better <S%H2896><s%> is it <S%H834>that<s%> thou shouldest <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5087>vow,<s%> than that thou shouldest <S%H4480>vow<s%> <S%H7945><s%> <S%H5087><s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7999>pay.<s%>

Suffer <S%H5414><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H853>cause<s%> thy <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H2398>sin;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> thou <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4397>angel,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> was an <S%H7684>error:<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> should <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H7107>angry<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H2254>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hands?<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams<s%> and <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> there are also divers <S%H1892>vanities:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853>thou<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> the <S%H6233>oppression<s%> of the <S%H7326>poor,<s%> and violent <S%H1499>perverting<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6664>justice<s%> in a <S%H4082>province,<s%> <S%H8539>marvel<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H2656>matter:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he that is <S%H1364>higher<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H1364>highest<s%> <S%H8104>regardeth;<s%> and there be <S%H1364>higher<s%> <S%H5921>than<s%> they.
Moreover the <S%H3504>profit<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> is for <S%H3605>all:<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> himself is <S%H5647>served<s%> by the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

He that <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3701>silver;<s%> nor <S%H4310>he<s%> that <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H1995>abundance<s%> with <S%H8393>increase:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

When <S%H2896>goods<s%> <S%H7235>increase,<s%> they are <S%H7231>increased<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> them: and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3788>good<s%> is there to the <S%H1167>owners<s%> thereof, <S%H3588>saving<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H7200>beholding<s%> of them with their <S%H5869>eyes?<s%>

The <S%H8142>sleep<s%> of a laboring <S%H5647>man<s%> is <S%H4966>sweet,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> he <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H7235>much:<s%> but the <S%H7647>abundance<s%> of the <S%H6223>rich<s%> will <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H5117>suffer<s%> him to <S%H3462>sleep.<s%>

There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H2470>sore<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> namely, <S%H6239>riches<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> for the <S%H1167>owners<s%> thereof to their <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>

But <S%H1931>those<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> by <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6045>travail:<s%> and he <S%H3205>begetteth<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and there is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

As <S%H834><s%> he came <S%H3318>forth<s%> of his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H4480>womb,<s%> <S%H990><s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> shall he <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> as he <S%H7945>came,<s%> <S%H935><s%> and shall <S%H5375>take<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> of his <S%H5999>labor,<s%> which he may carry <S%H7945>way<s%> <S%H1980><s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H2090>this<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is a <S%H2470>sore<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> that in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5980>points<s%> as he <S%H7945>came,<s%> <S%H935><s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall he <S%H1980>go:<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3504>profit<s%> hath he that hath <S%H7945>labored<s%> <S%H5998><s%> for the <S%H7307>wind?<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> he <S%H398>eateth<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and he hath <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H3707>sorrow<s%> and <S%H7110>wrath<s%> with his <S%H2483>sickness.<s%>

Behold <S%H2009><s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H7200>seen:<s%> it is <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3303>comely<s%> for one to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and to <S%H7200>enjoy<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5999>labor<s%> that he <S%H7945>taketh<s%> <S%H5998><s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H4557>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> him: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is his <S%H2506>portion.<s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H5233>wealth,<s%> and hath given him <S%H7980>power<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>thereof,<s%> and to <S%H5375>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2506>portion,<s%> and to <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H5999>labor;<s%> <S%H2090>this<s%> is the <S%H4991>gift<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6030>answereth<s%> him in the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
